hero_subtitle: Waa keen barnaamijka shukaansi ee dunida aad ugu jeceshahay?
section_1_intro_paragraph_bold: Dhowr milyan oo qof, ayaa isticmaala apps-ka si ay xayndaabka bulsho, mashquulka shaqo iyo xishoodkaba uga weecdaan si ay u helaan "qofka" ay ku haminayaan.
section_1_intro_paragraph: Qaar badan ayaa dareemay in uu awood u yeelay barnaamij shukaansi oo kombuyuutarka ah balse qaar kale ayaa rajo beel ah, xaalado kooban waxay keeneen halis ah majaxaabin.
section_1_map_title: Inta badan barnaamijyada shukaansi telefoonada ama kombuyuutarkaba ku soo degsadeen dal-dal hadii loo eego sanadkii 2015
section_1_map_alt: Qariidad muujinaysa barnaamijyada lagu haasaawo ee ugu badan dal-dal marka loo eego  2015
section_1_paragraph_map:
Iyadoo xogta ay BBC si gaar ah uga heshay BBC, shirkadda daraasaadka ee AppAnnie, waxaa suurtagal ah in laga hadlo sheegada barnaamijyada ka dambeeyay shukaansiga noocan ah. 

Hadii la eego suuqa barnaamijyada ugu wayn, laba magac ayaa ugu badnaa kuwa la isticmaalay 2015: Badoo and Tinder.

Ku dhowaad toban sano ka hor oo la sameeyay, Badoo ayaa noqday app-ka loogu adeegsiga badan yahay markay noqoto xod-xodashada ee 21 dal.

Tinder ayaa ahaa app-kii loogu badnaa ee la soo dajiyo ee 18 dal, waxaana uu aad ugu dhowaaday barnaamijka Badoo dalalka qaar.
section_2_paragraph_map: Waxaa jira tartan xoog leh oo u dhaxeeya labada barnaamij ee ugu waawayn. Tinder wuxuu ku xoog badan yahay dalalka waqooyi; Badoo dalalka bariga iyo koonfurta ayaa aad looga adeegsadaa, Lovoo - waxaa laga sameeyay magaalada Dresden oo uu kow ka yahay.
section_2_blockquote: Hadii kuwa haasaawayaa isa soo jiidan waayaan, sheekadu halkaas ayay ku dhamaanaysaa
section_2_paragraph_quote:
Andy, 45, wuxuu ka yimid Scotland, wuxuu ku nool yahay London waxaana uu guursaday oo ay xaas kala tageen laba jeer. Gabar ayay u dhashay xaaskiisii koowaad oo hadda 21 jirah.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
“Waxaan ku jiray barnaamijka Tinder muddo shan sano ku dhow. Waxay abuuraysaa marka hore bog aad isaga faalooto, waxaad ku daraysaa sawiradaada ugu wanaagsan, oo raacinaya qoraal aad isku iibinayso. Waxaad kadib noqonaynaa qof waxa uu ku sheegay halkaas ku dhaqma. Qof kasta ee kale oo ku jira app-ka sidaas ayuu yeelayaa.  
“Dhowr todobaad ayaad qoraal isku dir diraysaan, kadibna in aad kullantaan ayaad ka shaqaynaysaan. Inta uu socdo kulankiisa, hadii aad is ogaataan in aadan wada noolaan karin, sidaas ayaad isku dhaafaysaan.  
“Hadii aad is fahmi waysaa, dhib ma laha. Qof walba gurigiisa ayuu ku noqonayaa, iyadoo uu niyadjabsan yahay, balse wuu og yahay in meeshii koowaad hadana ka soo bilaabayo mar kale.
section_2_paragraph_video: “Si tan wax u dhigma loo helo, ayaa sadex ama afar la samaystaa markiiba. Qorshaha oo dhan waa mid ku haysanaya, waana mid noloshaada baabi'inaya. Qaybta haysashada waxaa keenaya kalinimada, oo ahba sababta ugu horaysa ee barnaamijyada loo soo galo, waxaanan isku dayaynaa in aan wehel ka dhiganno barnaamijka.”
section_2_summary: dalalka ka baxsan Russia, Egypt ayaa ah dalka kaliya ee Frim aad loo isticmaalo
section_3_paragraph_map: Suuq-haysashada barnaamijyada Tinder iyo Badoo ma gaaro  Bariga Aasiya, halkaas oo dal walba laga xiiseeyo barnaamijyo gaar ah. Shiinaha, Momo ayaa ah barnaamij ku bilowday wada-sheekaysiga balse hadda baraamij bulsho ayuu isku badalayaa.
section_3_blockquote: Waalidiinta ma moodaan in lamaane wanaagsan lagu heli karo qaabkan.
section_3_paragraph_quote:
Shruti, 30, and Nitin, 31, live in Delhi and work in finance. They found each other on TrulyMadly, an Indian-made app, which came second to Tinder in terms of downloads in 2015. They got married in November.

“At first we didn't inform our parents that we met through a dating app, but once they knew, they accepted it because we are both from the same religion and caste,” says Shruti.

“Parents don't think you'll get a good partner through dating apps because people are there just to have fake relationships and will just spend some time with a girl or boy then leave.”

“With arranged marriages, you meet the girl and her family, and then after a week or so, you have to reply,” says Nitin. “I don't like that because you don't have freedom or control.”
section_3_paragraph_video: “They will just allow us to meet that person for 15 or 20 minutes in some private place, but you cannot judge a person by just meeting them within 15 or 20 minutes,” says Shruti.
section_3_summary: In South Korea dating apps rank very poorly compared with other apps
section_4_paragraph_map: Egypt and Saudi Arabia use apps that have little popularity beyond their borders. Apart from Egypt, the only other country where Frim has a foothold is Russia. Similarly, WhosHere is specific to Saudi Arabia and Kuwait.
section_4_blockquote: Most of them want to take the relationship to the next level
section_4_paragraph_quote:
Aisha, whose name has been changed, is 42 and lives with her parents in Kuwait. She does not want to reveal her identity because dating is not accepted in her culture.
 
“I use Badoo. I'm trying to find some friends around the world. I’m trying to find people with an open mind, who are kind, intelligent, smart. People who really try to know and discover others.
 
“At the first meeting, I am a little bit shy as an Arabian girl meeting a strange person. I have a lot of traditions. But at the same time, I am of an age where I can recognise what is right or wrong. I tell them from the first day I am only offering friendship. Most of them don't accept - they want to take the relationship to a second level. But some of them say they need the same. I have made more than five friends this way. They are very very unique relationships.
 
“My family don't accept that kind of relationship because they don't agree about relations between men and women. But they know me very well and they know that I will not do something bad. At the same time, I have to be careful about the traditions, about my religion... about everything.”
section_5_paragraph_map: Badoo may be on top here, but in each case it only just beat Tinder. In South America dating apps are particularly popular compared with other apps.
section_5_blockquote: You don't have to be ashamed of it any more.
section_5_paragraph_quote:
Deborah is 22 and lives in Sao Paulo. She works in film production, is single and uses Tinder and Happn.
 
“I used to go to clubs, but it seems everyone goes for a single purpose - getting a girl or a guy. I don't really like the feeling. It feels like you're hunting or being hunted. In Brazil, some of the guys in clubs are really pushy. Sometimes, they try to kiss you even if you don't want to.
 
“It's a lot smoother through the apps. Even if you're shy, you can just swipe right on someone and start a conversation.
 
“I don't go out much, and I don't even have to go out to find someone I like. Just be in the app for a few minutes and you can find someone to talk to at least.
section_5_paragraph_video: “Before the apps, they used to have dating websites - people my age would never ever use them. Tinder and Happn made online dating more accessible and less embarrassing to younger people. You don't have to be ashamed of it any more, because most of your friends use it.”
section_5_summary: Tinder trails Badoo by just two places among lifestyle apps in Brazil, Chile and Argentina
section_6_paragraph_map: The lack of good mobile internet in many parts of Africa means the app market is still in its infancy here. Many people use social networks rather than dedicated dating platforms to meet partners. South Africa is the only African nation included in the world's top 50 app markets.
section_6_blockquote: I thought, ‘Today is my last day in the world’
section_6_paragraph_quote:
John, whose name has been changed, is 32, and works in a beauty salon in Nairobi. He doesn't want to use his real name because he could lose his job and his home if his boss and his landlord found out he was gay. He uses PlanetRomeo and Facebook to meet men, despite a bad experience on one meeting.

“He took my clothes off, then I took his clothes off. Then after five minutes, two men came into the house. They started shouting, ‘You people, are you gay?’

“They wanted me to pay 50,000 [Kenyan shillings], or they would call Mungiki [a violent criminal gang in Kenya], who would put tyres on me and set me on fire.

“I thought, ‘Oh my God, oh my God. Today is my last day in the world.’”

John managed to escape unharmed.
section_7_paragraph_map: Like Australia and the UK, Canada and the United States turn to Tinder to meet new people, while Mexico follows South America in its use of Badoo.  Tinder is the 10th most popular lifestyle app in Canada and 15th in the United States.
section_7_paragraph_quote:
Whitney, 24, lives in New York and works in marketing. She mainly uses Tinder and OKCupid.
 
“In New York, there are eight million people. How the hell are you supposed to find someone? There's so many people, so little time. So we use tools for everything. We have Uber; we even have a laundry app. Why wouldn't we have a dating app? 
 
“I have girlfriends who are single who will take my phone away just so they can start swiping for me because it becomes a sort of addictive game that you do.”
section_7_paragraph_video: “It’s crazy. You'll just have guys who are like, ‘Do you wanna come over? Can I come over? Do you wanna meet up now? Are you down to do whatever?’ Even if I was looking for a one night stand, not with you! Not with someone who completely bypasses etiquette."
table_heading_top_dating_app: app-ka ugu sareeya ee lagu ballammo
browser_notify: Bartan ayaa loo qaabeeyay browser-ada casriga ah, ma lagu gali karo Internet Explorer
idt_meta_description: Waa kuwee barnaamijka ugu badan badan dunida ee la soo dajisto??
credits:
50-ka app ee suuqyada adduunka ugu wayn (labada dal oo kale oo Afrika ku yaalla: Nigeria iyo Kenya),, waxaan ogaanay in ay jiraan app-s kale oo loo adeegsado qaabka noolaashaha iyo qaababka bulshada, waxay kala yihiin Apple's App Store iyo Google Play Store. Waxaan u aqoonsannay barnaamij is-ballansi ama shukaansi, in uu qof isku xayaysiinayo bartaas si uu ula kulmo dad cusub ama aasaasiyan ujeedadaas loo isticmaalo. Tusaale, laguma darin Facebook ama Whatsapp, inkastoo dad badan ay u adeegsadaan si ula kulmaan dad cusub.

Kuwa isticmaalay barnaamijka ama App-ka ayaa la hadlay Simon Maybin. Bogga waxaa isku dubaridday Emily Maguire, waxaa soo saaray Henry Clarke Price iyo  John Walton waxaa habeeyay Punit Shah.
onward_journey_text_1: Faahfaahin dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan sida teknolojiyadan ay u badalayso habka dadku u raadsadaan in ay helaan lamaanaha ay nolosha la qaybsan lahaayeen, ka dhagayso Jacaylka Casriga (Modern Love)  BBC World Service adigoo adeegsanaya Raadiyaha iPlayer.
share_description: Waa kee barnaamijka ugu badan badan dunida ee la soo dajisto?
